meeting_info.location: Videoconference/Room 6ES, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, Texas

presenters: Andrea Gilles, Interim Director, Planning and Urban Design
Andreea Udrea, Assistant Director, Current Planning, Planning and Urban Design

agenda_items.title: Update on the ForwardDallas Comprehensive Land Use Plan
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the updates to the ForwardDallas Comprehensive Land Use Plan.

agenda_items.title: Review FY2022-23 CPC Annual Report

agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the December 7, 2023 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Executive Session
agenda_items.description: The City Plan Commission may meet in closed session to seek the advice of its attorney about pending litigation.
